page.title: Realms
page.description: A journey of infinite discovery awaits you in Poptropica Realms. Create a brand-new world, and then use the power of Svadilfari to shape it into any form you can dream. Explore randomly generated terrain. Meet strange creatures. Build never-before-seen structures. Then share your creations with the world! In Poptropica Realms, the only limit is your imagination!
